p:
To keep the charges balanced on both electrodes, we can control the length of coaxial Chit-PEDOT fiber (0.07 mg/cm mass loading of PEDOT:PSS) and the amount of wrapped CNT sheets. The electrochemical properties of assembled asymmetric SC have been tested in 0.1 M PBS electrolyte to satisfy a further application in the biomedical field. CV curves and galvanostatic charge-discharge curves at different potential windows have been illustrated in Figure 7b,c with a scan rate of 50
mV
s
− 1
and a current density of 0.5
A
g
− 1
, respectively. The CV curves enjoyed a rectangular shape even when the potential window increased up to 1.4
V
, while the charge-discharge curves showing an asymmetric triangular shape without any significant IR drop.
